hadiths.text: Sa’d b. Abi Waqqas reported the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) as saying :If anyone says when he hears the MU’ADHDHIN : “And I testify that there is no god but Allah alone who has no partner and that Muhammad is His servant and Apostle: I am satisfied with Allah as lord, with Muhammad as apostle and with Islam as religion”, he will be forgiven

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا سَمِعَ الْمُؤَذِّنَ
chapter.eng-name: What Should Be Said When One Hears The Mu'adhdhin
